title: NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita: Nazeka Beach de Dogimagi Shimashita/Nazeka Moto Koutou Youma to Nakayoku Narimashita

synonyms: Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi
NEET de Otaku na Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita Episode 25 and 26
alternative_titles.en: I'm Living with an Otaku NEET Kunoichi!?: Somehow I Got Flustered at the Beach/Somehow I Got Close to Advanced-Level Yoma
alternative_titles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました 「なぜかビーチでドギマギしました」/ 「なぜか元高等妖魔と仲良くなりました」

synopsis: Special episodes of NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita that aired on the web, and were later included on the series Blu-ray volumes.
